SELECT c.id as stockCompanyId, c.name, c.stock_code, c.last_price, c.last_circulation,c.total_capitalization, c.last_income, a.holder_rank, a.holder_name, a.hold_count, a.hold_percent,a.zj ,a.change_percent,b.holder_type, a.created_time, b.report_time FROM t_share_holder_detail a LEFT JOIN t_company_share_holder b on a.holder_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_company_stock c on b.company_stock_id = c.id WHERE 1=1 and b.holder_type='2'
and a.holder_name = #{request.name}
and c.name like CONCAT('%', #{request.companyName} , '%')
and c.stock_code like CONCAT('%', #{request.companyStock} , '%')
and b.report_time = #{request.reportTime}
and a.change_percent not like CONCAT('%', '-' , '%')
and a.change_percent like CONCAT('%', '-' , '%')
and a.change_percent = '--'
ORDER BY c.last_price DESC ,b.report_time DESC
